verses.text: And Moses with the elders of Israel commanded the people , saying , Keep all the commandments which I command you this day.

And it shall be on the day when ye shall pass over Jordan unto the land which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God giveth thee, that thou shalt set thee up great stones , and plaister them with plaister :

And thou shalt write upon them all the words of this law , when thou art passed over , that thou mayest go in unto the land which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God giveth thee, a land that floweth with milk and honey ; as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* God of thy fathers hath promised thee.
Therefore it shall be when ye be gone over Jordan , \add that\add* ye shall set up these stones , which I command you this day , in mount Ebal , and thou shalt plaister them with plaister.
And there shalt thou build an altar unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God , an altar of stones : thou shalt not lift up \add any\add* iron \add tool\add* upon them.

Thou shalt build the altar of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God of whole stones : and thou shalt offer burnt offerings thereon unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God :
And thou shalt offer peace offerings , and shalt eat there, and rejoice before the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God.
And thou shalt write upon the stones all the words of this law very plainly. \p
¶ And Moses and the priests the Levites spake unto all Israel , saying , Take heed , and hearken , O Israel ; this day thou art become the people of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God.
Thou shalt therefore obey the voice of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God , and do his commandments and his statutes , which I command thee this day. \p
¶ And Moses charged the people the same day , saying ,
These shall stand upon mount Gerizim to bless the people , when ye are come over Jordan ; Simeon , and Levi , and Judah , and Issachar , and Joseph , and Benjamin :
And these shall stand upon mount Ebal to curse ; Reuben , Gad , and Asher , and Zebulun , Dan , and Naphtali.\f + \fr 27.13 \ft to curse: Heb. for a cursing\f* \p
¶ And the Levites shall speak , and say unto all the men of Israel with a loud voice ,

Cursed \add be\add* the man that maketh \add any\add* graven or molten image , an abomination unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the work of the hands of the craftsman , and putteth \add it\add* in \add a\add* secret \add place\add*. And all the people shall answer and say , Amen.
Cursed \add be\add* he that setteth light by his father or his mother. And all the people shall say , Amen.
Cursed \add be\add* he that removeth his neighbour’s landmark. And all the people shall say , Amen.
Cursed \add be\add* he that maketh the blind to wander out of the way. And all the people shall say , Amen.
Cursed \add be\add* he that perverteth the judgment of the stranger , fatherless , and widow. And all the people shall say , Amen.
Cursed \add be\add* he that lieth with his father’s wife ; because he uncovereth his father’s skirt. And all the people shall say , Amen.
Cursed \add be\add* he that lieth with any manner of beast. And all the people shall say , Amen.
Cursed \add be\add* he that lieth with his sister , the daughter of his father , or the daughter of his mother. And all the people shall say , Amen.
Cursed \add be\add* he that lieth with his mother in law. And all the people shall say , Amen.
Cursed \add be\add* he that smiteth his neighbour secretly. And all the people shall say , Amen.
Cursed \add be\add* he that taketh reward to slay an innocent person. And all the people shall say , Amen.
Cursed \add be\add* he that confirmeth not \add all\add* the words of this law to do them. And all the people shall say , Amen.
